attributes.action: have military cadet training for all school children aged 12 and over
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the current cadet forces , ATC, ACF, sea cadets turn out well rounded young men and women. Please extend this to all secondary schools in the country by employing some of the thousands of ex servicemen being made redundant as discip and citizenship instructors. make it a compulsory part of the school curriculum. The cost of this training would be more than outweighed by the reduction in crime and vandalism early training would bring
